tool_description: Analyzes file and directory permissions, ownership, and access rights for a given list of paths.

file_paths.description: Array of file or directory paths to analyze

check_readable.description: Check if files are readable by current user

check_writable.description: Check if files are writable by current user

check_executable.description: Check if files are executable by current user

error_messages: Empty file list: Provide at least one file path to analyze.
Path does not exist: One or more specified paths do not exist.
Permission denied: Cannot access permission information for one or more files.
System error: Unable to retrieve permission data due to system limitations.
usage: Provide an array of file_paths to analyze. Optionally specify which permission types to check. Returns detailed permission information for each file.

readable_files.description: Array of file paths that are readable

writable_files.description: Array of file paths that are writable

executable_files.description: Array of file paths that are executable
